title: Analysis and application of ICT-enhanced science education effectiveness

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience in using digital tools
context.additional_context: A course for pre-service teachers to develop competencies in effectively utilizing ICT tools in science instruction

learning_goals: Learners can classify at least three types and functions of ICT tools applicable in science classes.
Learners can analyze the impact of ICT tools on science learning outcomes using empirical data.
Learners can develop ICT-integrated lesson design plans based on survey results.
Learners can propose at least five guidelines for using ICT tools in science classes within a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
